Name: tha-groupfromthesoc-la
Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

Translations.Text: læa rea midi sng phirphl lng ma cak fak fa kæ hmu chn khxng khea hlangcak khea læa rea k michı pen phu sng phwk khea lng ma
man michı xun dı ley nxkcak seiyng kampnath pheiyng khrang deiyw læw meux nan phwk khea k dab ngeiyb
xo xnicca tx pwng baw mimi rx su l khn dı mayang phwk khea wentæ phwk khea di yey hyan khea
phwk khea midi phicarna dxk hrux wa ki stwrrsʹ ma læw kxn hna phwk khea rea di thalay doythi khea hela nan midi klab mayang phwk khea
læa tæla khnnı phwk khea thanghmd ca thuk na ma prakt taw txhna rea
læa sayyan hnung sahrab phwk khea k khux phændin thi hænglæng rea di hı man mi chiwitchiwa khun ma læa rea di na meld phuch xxk ma cak man sung swn hnung cak meld phuch nan phwk khea chı kin
læa rea di thahı mi nı phændin nan reuxkswn mak hlay cak xinthphlam læa xngun læa rea di tha mi tana nı nan
pheux phwk khea ca di kin phl mi khxng man læa cak sing thi mux khxng phwk khea di kratha man khun læw phwk khea ca mi khxbkhun kranan hrux
mha brisuththi ying dæ phra phuthrng srang thuk sing thanghmd pen khu «cak sing thi phændin di (hı man) ngxkngey khun ma læa cak taw khxng phwk khea xeng læa cak sing thi phwk khea miru
læa sayyan hnung sahrab phwk khea k khux klangkhun rea di thxn klangwan xxk cak man læw phwk khea k xyu nı khwam mud
læa dwng xathity khocr tam withi khxng man nan khux kar kahnd khxng phra phuthrng xanac phuthrng rxbru
læa dwng canthr nan rea di kahnd hı man khocr tam tahænng cnkrathang man di klay ma pen chen king xinthphlam hæng
dwng xathity k mi smkhwr (xnumati) kæ man thi ca li tam kıl dwng canthr læa klangkhun k ca mi lahna klangwan læa thanghmd nan ca weiyn way xyu nı cakrrasi
Læa sayyan hnung sahrab phwk khea k khux rea di brrthuk luk hlan khxng phwk khea wi nı reux cn tem
læa rea di srang thanxng deiywkan ni (reux hıy) kæ phwk khea pheux hı phwk khea khabkhi
læa tha rea prasngkh rea k ca cm phwk khea seiy læw ca mimi phu rxng takon pheux khx khwam chwyhelux hı kæ khea læa phwk khea k ca mi thuk chwy hı rxdphn (cak kar cm natay) dwy
wentæ dwy khwam metta cak rea læa khwam phelidphelin chaw raya hnung
læa meux di miseiyng klaw kæ phwk khea wa cng rawang sing thi xyu khang hna phwk cea læa sing thi xyu khang hlang phwk cea pheux phwk cea ca di rab khwam metta
læa mimi sayyan dı nı brrda sayyan khxng phracea khxng phwk khea di mi mayang phwk khea wentæ phwk khea ca phinhlanghı kæ sayyan nan «

læa meux miseiyng klaw kæ phwk khea wa cng bricakh cak sing thi xallxh thrng prathan pen paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea brrda phu ptiseth sraththa di klaw kæ brrda phu sraththa wa rea ca hı xahar kæ phu thi ha kxallxh thrng prasngkh k ca hı xahar kæ khea kranan hrux? Phwk than michı xun dı ley nxkcak xyu nı kar hlng phid xyang chad cæng
læa phwk khea klaw wa meux dı lea sayya ni ca keid khun hak phwk than pen phu saty cring
phwk khea midi khxy sing dı ley nxkcak seiyng kampnath pheiyng khrang deiyw sung ca khra chiwit phwk khea nı khna thi phwk khea totheiyng kan xyu
læw phwk khea k mi samarth ca sang seiy xan dı læa phwk khea k mithan ca klab pi yang khrxbkhraw khxng phwk khea di
læa sangkh k ca thuk pea khan thandı nan phwk khea ca xxk cak hlum fang sph læw phwk khea k ribrud pi yang phracea khxng phwk khea

phwk khea klaw wa xo khwam hayna thi prasb kæ rea! Khır lea thi hı rea fun khun cak thinxn khxng rea (ku bur) (ca miseiyng klaw khun wa) nihæla khux sing thi phra phuthrng kruna prani di thrng sayya wi læa brrda rx sul di klaw smcring læw
Mimi xari dxk nxkcak seiyng kampnath pheiyng khrang deiyw thandı nan phwk khea thanghmd k ca thuk na ma prakt txhna rea
nı wan nan mimi chiwit dı (phu dı) ca thu kx yutithrrm tæ prakar dı læa phwk cea ca mi di rab kar txbthæn nxkcak sing thi phwk cea di ptibati wi
thæcring nı wan nan chaw swrrkh ca xyu nı kickrrm xan sukh saray
phwk khea læa khukhrxng khxng phwk khea ca xyu phay tı rm ngea nxn xekkhenk xyu bn keaxi nwm
sahrab phwk khea nı swn swrrkh nan ca mi phl mi (hlak chnid) læa sahrab phwk khea ca mi sing thi phwk khea txngkar
khwam santi! Phra daras hnung cak phracea phuthrng metta semx
xo brrda xachyakr thanghlay xey! Wan ni phwk cea cng thxy hang xxk pi hı phn
kha midi baycha phwk cea dxk hrux xo luk hlan khx ngxadam xey! Wa phwk cea xya di khearph bucha chay txn mar ray thæcring man nan pen satru taw chkac khxng phwk cea
læa phwk cea cng khearph phakdi tx kha ni khux næwthang xan theiyngthæ
læa doy nænxn man di thahı hmu chn canwn mak khxng phwk cea hlng thang thami phwk cea cung mi chı stipayya khırkhrwy lea
ni khux nrk yahannam sung phwk cea thuk sayya wi
wan ni phwk cea ca kheapi lim rs man neuxng pheraa phwk cea ptiseth
wan ni rea ca pid phnuk pak khxng phwk khea læa mux khxng phwk khea ca phud kæ rea læa thea khxng phwk khea ca pen phyan tam thi phwk khea di ptibati wi
læa hak rea prasngkh rea k ca thahı ta khxng phwk khea bxd lng læw phwk khea k ca khla ha thang tæ phwk khea ca hen di xyangri
læa hak rea prasngkh rea k ca pælng rup khxng phwk khea hı xyu kab thi khxng phwk khea læw phwk khea k mi xac ca pi khang hna di læa k mi xac ca thxy klab di
læa phu dı thi rea thahı khea mixayu yunnan rea ca hı klabkhun su sphaph meux txn ræk keid læw phwk khea mi chi stipayya khırkhrwy bang hrux
rea midi sxn kwiniphnth kæ khea (muhammad) læa mi hemaasm kæ khea(thi ca penk wi)khamphir ni michı xun dı ley nxkcak pen khx takteuxn læa pen khamphir xan chad cæng
Pheux takteuxn phu thi mi chiwit læa pheux khx takteuxn nan pen hlakthan yunyan kæ brrda phu ptiseth sraththa
læa phwk khea midi phicarna dud xk hrux rea di srang psusatw khun ma pheux phwk khea cak sing thi mux khxng rea di tha khun læw phwk khea kdi khrxbkhrxng man
læa rea di thahı man yxm cann kæ phwk khea dangnan bang chnid man k pen phahna kæ phwk khea læa bang chnid phwk khea k chı kin pen xahar
læa nı taw man nan mi prayochn mak hlay læa kheruxng dum sahrab phwk khea læw phwk khea ca yang mi khxbkhun xik hrux
læa phwk khea di yudthux xea phracea mak hlay (pen thi khearph sakkara) xun ca kxallxh hwang wa phwk khea ca di rab khwam chwyhelux (cak man)
phwk man mi samarth chwyhelux phwk khea di phwk khea ca thuk na ma prakt taw penk lum «pheux phwk man
dangnan xya di hı kha phud khxng phwk khea pen thi seiycı kæ cea thæcring rea ru di thung sing thi phwk khea pidbang læa sing thi phwk khea peidphey
mnusʹy midi phicarna dud xk hrux wa rea di bangkeid khea ma cak na xsuci læw cng du si khea di klay pen khuprpaksʹ taw chkac
læa khea di yk xuthahrn periybtheiyb kæ rea læa khea di lumtn kaneid khxng khea khea klaw wa khır lea ca hı kraduk mi chiwit khun ma xik nı meux man pen phuyphng pi læw
cng klaw theid muhammad phra phuthrng hı kaneid man khrang ræk nan yxm ca thrng hı man mi chiwit khun ma xik læa phraxngkh pen phuthrng rxbru kar bangkeid thuk sing
phuthrng thahı mi fi sahrab phwk cea cak tnmi kheiyw sd (læw cng du si) phwk cea kdi cud man cak cheuxfi nan
phraxngkh phuthrng srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin ca mi thrng samarth thi ca srang chen deiyw kab phwk khea kranan hrux nænxn læa phraxngkh pen phuthrng srang thi ying hıy phuthrng rxbru
thæcring phra baycha khxng phraxngkh meux thrng prasngkh sing dı phraxngkh k ca tras kæ man wa cng pen læw man k ca pen khun ma
Dangnan mha brisuththi ying dæ phraxngkh sung nı phrahatth khxng phraxngkh mi xanac henux thuk sing læa yang phraxngkh theanan thi phwk cea ca thuk na klab pi
khx saban dwy (ma la xik ahˌ) phu khea thæw tam ladab
læa (ma la xik ahˌ) phu khwbkhum xyang radkum
læa (ma la xik ahˌ) phu xan khx takteuxn
thæcring phracea khxng phwk cea nan thrng xe ka xyang nænxn
phracea hæng chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa sing thi xyu nı rahwang thang sxng læa phracea hæng thisthang tawanxxk
thæcring rea di pradab thxngfa hæng lok dun ya xyang swyngam dwy dwngdaw thanghlay
læa pheux pxngkan ca kchaytx nmar ray thuk taw thi dux ran phys
phwk man ca mi samarth rab fang (cak ma la xik ahˌ phu xyu) nı chan fa chan sung di læa phwk man ca thuk khwang cak thuk «dan
thuk khab li si sng xxk ma læa sahrab phwk man nan ca di rab kar lngthosʹ xyang tx neuxng
wentæ taw dı thi man chkchwy xea pi di mætæ khrang deiyw k ca mi pelw pheling xan chotichwng li tidtam man pi

cea cng tham phwk khea (brrda phu ptiseth kar fun khunchiph) si wa phwk khea mi khwam khængkærng ying nı sing thi thuk srang mak ra nan hrux? Hrux wa sing thi rea di srang man ma (khængkærng ying kwa) thæcring rea di srang phwk khea ma cak din heniyw
tæ cea khng pælk cı khna thi phwk khea yeaa yey
læa meux phwk khea thuk teuxn hı raluk phwk khea k ca mi yxmrab khx takteuxn
læa meux phwk khea mxng hen sing patihariy phwk khea k chakchwn kan yeaa yey
læa phwk khea klaw wa ni michı xun dı ley nxkcak leh kl xyang chad cæng
meux rea tay pi læw læa rea di klay pen din phng læa kraduk rea ca thuk hı fun khunchiph xik næ la hrux
læw brrphburusʹ khxng phwk rea run kxn«nan dwy hrux
cng klaw theid muhammad chı læw læa phwk cea ca pen phu xabxay khay hna xik dwy
khwam cring man pen pheiyng seiyng phæd takon kxng pheiyng khrang deiyw læw phwk khea ca cxng mxng
Læw phwk khea k klaw wa xo khwam hayna kæ rea ni khux wan hæng kar txbthæn
(ma la xik ahˌ ca txb wa) ni khux wan hæng kar chikhad tadsin sung phwk than khey ptiseth man
cng rwbrwm brrda phu xthrrm læa brrda shay khxng phwk khea læa sing thi phwk khea khearph sakkara
xun ca kxallxhˌ læw cng næana thang kæ phwk khea pi su thang hæng nrk
læa cng yabyang phwk khea wi pheraa phwk khea ca txng thuk sxbswn
(ca miseiyng tham khun wa) keid xari khun kæ phwk cea thami cung mi chwyhelux sung kanlæakan
tæwa phwk khea nı wan nan pen phu yxm cann doy sincheing
læa bang khnnı hmu phwk khea ca han ma ha kan titham sung kanlæakan
phwk khea klaw wa thæcring phwk than khey khea ma ha rea thang dan khwa
phwk khea (hawhna) klaw wa pela dxk! Phwk than tanghak thi mi yxm sraththa
læa rea mimi xa nac dı«henux phwk than tæwa phwk than pen hmu chn thi dux ran tanghak
dangnan phra daras khxng phracea khxng rea cung khukhwr kæ rea læw thæcring rea nan pen phu txng lim rs xyang nænxn
rea di næana phwk than hı hlng phid thang«thi khwam cring phwk rea k hlng phid xyu læw
thæcring phwk khea nı wan nan yxm mi swn bæng rwm kan nı kar di rab thosʹ
thæcring chen nan hæla rea di ptibati tx brrda phu mi khwam phid
pheraawa phwk khea hela nan meux di mi kar klaw kæ phwk khea wa mimi phracea xun dı nxk ca kxallxhˌ phwk khea k hying phyxng
læa phwk khea ca klaw wa ca hı rea thxdthing phracea tang«khxng phwk rea pheux nak kwi ba khn hnung kranan hrux
pela dxk! Khea (muhammad) di na sacthrrm ma læa pheux yunyan brrda rx sul tanghak
thæcring phwk cea ca txng lim rs kar lngthosʹ xan cebpwd xyang nænxn
læa phwk cea ca mi di rab kar txbthæn xun dı nxkcak sing thi phwk cea di kratha xea wi

phl mi hlak chnid læa phwk khea kdi rab keiyrti
Nı swn swrrkh hlakhlay xan runrmy
xyu bn teiyng hanhnakheahakan
khn rab chı ca wnweiyn rxb taw phwk khea phrxm dwy kæw (hela) thima cak lathar
(hela nan) khaw brisuththi yang khwam xocha kæ brrda phu dum
nı nan ca mi thahı pwd mun sirsʹa læa phwk khea k ca mi munmea cak man
læa n thi phwk khea nan mi brrda hying brisuththi phu ld sayta lng ta mid wng tato swy
semuxn hnung phwk nang pen khi thuk hum peluxk xea wi
læw (chaw swrrkh hela nan) bang khnnı hmuban phwk khea ca khea ma ha kan titham (thukkhsukh) sung kanlæakan
khn hnung nı hmuban phwk khea k klaw khun wa thæcring chan mi pheuxn khn hnung
khea khey klaw wa thæcring than pen khn hnung nı hmu phu cheux man (nı wan prlok) cring hrux
meux rea tay pi læw læa rea di klay pen din phng læa kraduk rea ca thuk txbthæn cring hrux
khea (chaw swrrkh) klaw (kæ pheuxn«khxng khea) wa phwk than xyak ca mxng du him lea
khran meux khea mxng lng pi k hen (pheuxn khxng khea) xyu thamklang fi thi luk chotichwng
khea cung klaw khun wa khx saban dwy phranam khx ngxallxhˌ than keuxb thahı chan phang phinas
læa hak michı khwam pordpran hæng phracea khxng chan læw chan ca txng xyu nı hmu phu thuk na ma lngthosʹ xyang nænxn
dangnan rea ca mi tay
wentæ kar tay khxng rea khrang ræk læa rea ca mi thuk lngthosʹ kranan hrux
thæcring ni khux khwam sarec khrang ying hıy xyang nænxn
pheux yeiyng (kar txbthæn) ni brrda phu txsu dinrn cng txsu tx pi theid
nan penkar txnrab thi di kwa hrux wa tn sak kum
thæcring rea di cad tha wi penkar thdsxb kæ brrda phu xthrrm
thæcring man pentn mi thi xea xxk ma cak knbung khxng nrk thi mi fi luk chotichwng
phl khxng man khlay kab haw khxng chay txn
læw phwk khea ca kin man læa phwk khea ca teim man hı tem thxng
læw nxkcak nan phwk khea ca di na dum thi phsm cak na deuxd
Læw thæcring thang klab khxng phwk khea nan yxm pi su fi thi luk chotichwng xyang nænxn
thæcring phwk khea phb brrphburusʹ khxng phwk khea xyu nı kar hlng phid
læw phwk khea k yang rib reng ceriyrxy tamph wk khea
læa doy nænxn swn mak khxng chn run kxn hna phwk khea di hlng phid
læa doy nænxn rea di sng phu takteuxn pi nı hmu phwk khea
dangnan cea cng dutheid wa phl sudthay khxng phwk thi thuk teuxn nan pen xyangri
wentæ pwng baw khx ngxallxhˌ phu suxsaty
læa doy næ nxn nuhˌ di rxngkhx rea dangnan phu txb snxng chang praserith seiy ni krari
læa rea di chwy khea læa chumchn khxng khea hı phn cak thukkh phay xan mhant
læa rea di hı luk hlan khxng khea yang khng mi chiwit helux xyu
læa rea di plxy thing wi (keiyrtikhun) kæ khea nı klum chn run hlang«

læw rea di hı phwk xun cm natay
læa thæcring phu thi danein tam næwthang khxng khea nan khux xi brxhim
meux khea di kheaha phracea khxng khea dwy citcı thi brisuththi
meux khea di klaw kæ bida khxng khea læa hmu chn khxng khea wa phwk than khearph phakdi xari kan
pheux khwam thec kranan hrux thi phwk than prarthna phracea xun ca kxallxhˌ
dangnan khwam nukkhid khxng phwk than thi mi tx phracea hæng sakl lok ca pen xyangri
khea (xi brxhim) cung cxng mxng pi yang dwngdaw thanghlay
læw khea k klaw khun wa thæcring chan mi sbay cring«
dangnan phwk khea cung han hlang hı khea læa klab xxk pi
læ wxi brxhi mk bayhna pi yang cewd tang«khxng phwk khea læw phud wa phwk cea mi kin (xahar hela ni) bang hrux
thami phwk cea cung mi phud lea
læw khea k han pi ti phwk man dwy muxkhwa (sung thux khwan xyu)
læw phwk khea k rib wing ma ha khea

Thang «thi xallxhˌ thrng srang phwk than læa sing thi phwk than pradisʹth man khun ma
phwk khea klaw wa cng srang sthan thi hæng hnung (tea phea) sahrab khea læw yon khea pi nı fi thi luk chon
dangnan phwk khea txngkar wangphæn ray kæ khea tæ rea di thahı phwk khea tatxy
læa xi brxhi mk la w wa chan ca pi ha phracea khxng chan nænxn phraxngkh ca thrng næa thang hı kæ chan
kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh khx phraxngkh thrng prathan butr thima cak hmu khn di hı kæ kha phraxngkh dwy
dangnan rea cung cæng khawdi kæ khea (wa ca di) luk khn hnung thi mi khwam xdthn khanti (khux xis ma xil)

khran meux khea (xis ma xil) teibto khun pi hin ma hin kab khea (xi brxhim) di læw xi brxhim di klaw khun wa xo luk xey! Thæcring phx di hen nı khna fan wa phx di cheuxd cea cng khid du si wa cea ca hen pen xyangri? Khea klaw wa xo phx ca! Phx cng ptibati tam thi phx di thuk baycha ma theid ha kxallxhˌ thrng prasngkh phx ca hen chan wa chan xyu nı hmu phu mi khwam xdthn
khran meux thang sxng (phx læa luk) di yxm mxb tn (dæ xallxhˌ) xi brxhim di hı xis ma xi l khwa hna lng kab phun
læa rea di reiyk khea wa xo xi brxhim xey
nænxn cea di ptibati thuk txng tam fan læw thæcring chen nan hæla rea ca txbthæn phu kratha khwam di thanghlay
thæcring nan khux kar thdsxb thi chad cæng nænxn

læa rea di plxy thing wi (keiyrtikhun) kæ khea nı klum chn run hlang«

rea di cæng khawdi kæ khea wa ca di (luk khn hnung) xis hak pen nabi (ca pen hnung) nı hmu khn di thanghlay

Khea di thahı phracea hlay xngkh pen phracea xngkh deiyw kranan hrux? Thæcring ni pen reuxng prahlad cring «

rea mi khey diyin reuxng ni ma kxn nı sasna sudthay ni michı xun dı nxkcak penkar seksrr pan tæng khun ma theanan

di mi khx takteuxn (xalkurxan) thuk prathan lng ma kæ khea thæn phwk rea kranan hrux? Hamidi phwk khea xyu nı kar sngsay cak khx takteuxn khxng kha! Mi pheiyng tæ theanan phwk khea yang midi lim rs kar lngthosʹ khxng kha
hrux wa n thi phwk khea mi khum khlang hæng khwam metta khxng phracea khxng cea phuthrng xanac phuthrng prathan hı xyang makmay
hrux wa xanac hæng chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa thi xyu rahwang thang sxng pen khxng phwk khea dangnan cng hı phwk khea khun pi ha sahetu kan theid
(phwk khea) pen phirphl cak næwrwm tang «ca phay thæ hni telid pi nı mi cha ni
kxn hna phwk khea hmu chn khxng nuh læa xad læa fir xea n ceakhxng sea hmud di ptiseth ma læw
læa sʹamud læa hmu chn khxng lut læa chaw pathub chn hela ni pen næwrwm
mimi khn hnung khn dı (nı phwk khea) wentæ ptiseth brrda rx sul dangnan kar lngthosʹ khxng kha cung hemaasm (kæ phwk khea)
læa phwk khea hela nan midi khxy xan dı nxkcak seiyng kampnath pheiyng khrang deiyw doy mimi kar chakcha
læa phwk khea klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng rea khx thrng pord reng swn khxng rea hı kæ rea doy rew theid kxn thi ca thung wan hæng kar chara baychi
cea (muhammad) cng xdthn tx sing thi phwk khea klaw læa cng raluk thung baw khxng rea dawu d phuthrng phlang (nı kar ptibati sasn kic) thæcring khea pen phu phin hna khea ha xallxh semx

Læa (rea di thahı) nk ma rwm kan thanghmd cheuxfang khea
læa rea di thahı xanacakr khxng khea khemkhæng læa rea di hı khwam kheacı thi thuk txng kæ khea læa kar tadsin chikhad nı reuxng tang «
læa mi reuxng khxng phu totheiyng ma thung cea (muhammad) bang him? Meux phwk khea pin kham kaphæng pi thi mihˌ rxb (khx ngdawud)

meux phwk khea di khea ma ha dawu d khea tkcı klaw phwk khea phwk khea klaw wa xya di klaw ley rea khux phu totheiyng sxng khn khn hnung nı phwk rea di lwngkein xik khn hnung dangnan di pord tadsin rahwang phwk rea dwy khwam yutithrrm læa xya di laxeiyng mi theiyngthrrm læa cng chinæa rea su næwthang thi theiyngtrng
thæcring ni khux phi chay khxng chan khea mi kæa tawmeiy 99 taw læa chan mi kæa tawmeiy taw deiyw læw khea yang phud wa xea man ma hı chan si læa khea di khmkhu chan nı kha phud

khea (dawu d) klaw wa nænxn khea xthrrm tx than nı kar khx hı na kæa khxng than pi rwm kab kæa khxng khea læa thæcring swn mak khxng phu mi hunswn rwm kan bang khnnı phwk khea mak lameid siththi khxng xik khn hnung wentæ brrda phu sraththa læa prakxb khwam di thanghlay læa phwk khea chen ni mi nxy læa dawu dru suk wa rea di thdsxb khea dangnan khea cung di khxxphay tx phracea khxng khea læa khea di km lng ru kawa læa thbthwn khwam phid dwy khwam seiycı
dangnan rea di hıxphay kæ khea nı reuxng nan læa thæcring sahrab khea nan yxm xyu kıl chid n thi rea læa thang klab thi di ying (nı prlok)

xo dawu d xey! Rea di tængtang cea hı pen tawthæn nı phændin ni dangnan cea cng tadsin khdi tang «rahwang mnusʹy dwy khwam yutithrrm læa xya ptibati tam xarmn fıta man ca thahı cea hlng pi cak thang khx ngxallxh thæcring brrda phu thi hlng pi cak thang khx ngxallxh nan sahrab phwk khea ca di rab kar lngthosʹ xyang sahas neuxngdwy phwk khea lum wan hæng kar chara baychi

Læa rea midi srang chan fa læa phændin læa sing thi xyu rahwang thang sxng nan doy ri sara nan khux kar nukkhid khxng brrda phu ptiseth sraththa dangnan khwam hayna khux fi nrk cng prasb kæ brrda phu ptiseth sraththa
ca hı rea ptibati tx brrda phu sraththa læa kratha khwam di thanghlay chen brrda phu bxnthalay nı phændin kranan hrux? Hrux wa ca hı rea ptibati tx brrda phu yakerng chen brrda khn chaw kranan hrux
khamphir (xalkurxan) rea di prathan lng ma hı kæ cea sung mi khwam careiy pheux phwk khea ca di phinic phicarna xa ya t tang«khx ngxalkurxan læa pheux pwng phu mi stipayya ca di khırkhrwy
rea di prathan (butr) khux su lay man baw phu praserith kæ dawu d thæcring khea han hna khea su rea semx
læa cng raluk meux ma phanthu di thuk na ma senx kæ khea nı yam yen wan hnung
khea klaw wa thæcring chan rak thraphysmbati (hmay thung ma) cn man thahı chan lum kar raluk thung phracea khxng chan cnkrathang dwng xathity lab khxb fa
cng na man klab ma hı chan læw khea k reim lub kha læa khx khxng man
læa doy nænxn rea di thdsxb su lay man læa rea di wang rang hnung wi bn keaxi khxng khea læw khea k thbthwn khwam phid dwy khwam seiycı

khea klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng kha phraxngkh khx phraxngkh thrng xphay hı kæ kha phraxngkh dwy khx phraxngkh thrng prathan xanac xan kwangkhwang kæ kha phraxngkh sung mi khukhwr kæ phu dı nxkcak kha phraxngkh thæcring phraxngkh theanan pen phuthrng prathan hı xyang makmay
læa rea di thahı lm phad cheuxy «tam baycha khxng khea pi yang thisthang thi khea txngkar
læa (rea di thahı) brrda chay txn (xyu tı kha sang khxng khea) phwk nan thanghmd pen chang kxsrang læa pradana
læa phwk xun «thuk phanthnakar dwy so tid kan
ni khux kar prathan hı khxng rea (kæ su lay man) dangnan cea ca hı kæ khır kdi hrux ca yabyang mi hı khır kdi doy cea ca mi thuk sxbswn
Læa thæcring sahrab khea nan yxm xyu kıl chid n thi rea læa thang klab thi di ying (nı prlok)
læa cng raluk thung baw khxng rea xay yub meux khea wingwxn khx tx phracea khxng khea doy klaw wa chay txn mar ray di thahı chan di rab khwam henuxy yak læa thukkh thrman
cng krathub (phændin) dwy thea khxng cea ni khux na yen sahrab xab chara lang læa sahrab dum
læa rea di prathan khrxbkhraw khxng khea hı kæ khea læa chen deiyw kab phwk khea phrxm phwk khea pen khwam metta cak rea læa pen khx teuxnsti dæ pwng phu mi sti thanghlay
læa cng xea sesʹ mi sak ka hnung læw fad dwy man læa xya thxn kha saban thæcring rea phb wa khea (xay yub) pen phu xdthn baw phu praserith thæcring khea han hna khea su rea semx
læa cng raluk thung pwng baw khxng rea xi brxhim xis hak læa yaxˌ kub phu thi khemkhæng læa sayta kil (nı reuxng sasna)
rea di leuxk phwk khea doy chephaa pheux teuxn hı raluk thung prlok
læa thæcring phwk khea nan nı thasna khxng rea nænxn xyu nı hmu phu di rab leuxk pheraa phwk khea pen khn di
læa cng raluk thung xis ma xil læa xal ya saxˌ læa salkif li læa thuk khn xyu nı hmu phudi leis
ni khux khx takteuxn læa thæcring sahrab brrda phu yakerng nan nænxn thang klab (khxng phwk khea) yxm praserith thæ
khux swn swrrkh hlakhlay xan sthaphr pratu (thuk ban) ca peid xa wi sahrab txnrab phwk khea
nxn xekkhenk xyu nı swn swrrkh phwk khea ca reiyk xea phl mi læa kheruxng dum nana chnid
læa n thi phwk khea nan mi hying brisuththi phu ld sayta lng ta mixayu runrawkhrawdeiywkan
ni khux sing thi phwk cea thuk sayya wi sahrab wan hæng kar chara baychi
thæcring ni khux paccay yangchiph khxng rea xyang nænxn man ca mimi wan hmd sin
dangnan læa thæcring sahrab brrda phu lameid nan nænxn thang klab (khxng phwk khea) yxm lew cring «
khux nrk yahannam phwk khea ca kheapi phea him nı man dangnan man pen thi phanak thi chawcha ying
Ni (khux kar lngthosʹ xan cebsæb) dangnan phwk cea cng lim rs man (khux) na deuxd phlan læa na leuxd na hnxng (khxng chaw nrk)
læa (kar lngthosʹ) chnid xun xik yeiyng kar lngthosʹ dang klaw thi theatheiym khukhwr kan
ni khux fung chn wing kru kan pi phrxm kab phwk cea mimi kar txnrab phwk khea dxk thæcring phwk khea ca kheapi xyu nı fi nrk
phwk khea klaw wa tæwa phwk than tanghak mimi kar txnrab phwk than pheraa phwk than di teriymtaw wi sahrab rea dangnan man pen thiphak xan chawcha
phwk khea klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng rea phu dı thi di teriym kar lngthosʹ ni wi hı kæ rea khx phraxngkh di thrng pord pheim kar lngthosʹ kæ khea pen sxng thea nı fi nrk
læa phwk khea klaw wa mi xari keid khun kæ rea thami rea cung mi hen chay xik hlay khn thi rea nab phwk khea wa xyu nı hmu phu lew thram ying
neuxng pheraa rea thux xea phwk khea pen thi yeaa yey na khan hrux sayta khxng phwk rea khladkheluxn pi cak phwk khea
thæcring nan khux khwam cring thi chaw nrk tang totheiyng kan
cng klaw theid (muhammad) thæcring chan pen tæ phu takteuxn theanan mimi phracea xun dı nxk ca kxallxhˌ phuthrng xe ka phuthrng phichit
phracea hæng chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa sing thi xyu nı rahwang thang sxng phuthrng xanac phuthrng xphay xyang mak hlay
cng klaw theid (muhammad) ni khux khaw sakhay xan ying hıy
thi phwk than phinhlanghı kab man
chan mi khey ru ma kxn ley nı reuxng khx ngm la xik ahˌ meux phwk khea totheiyng kan
(pheraa) midi mi wa hiyyˌ kæ chan nxkcak wa chan pen pheiyng phu takteuxn xan chad cæng theanan
cng raluk thung khna thi phracea tras kæ mla xik ahˌ wa thæcring kha ca srang mnusʹy khn hnung cak din
dangnan meux kha di thahı khea mi ruprang smswn læa di pea wiyyan cak kha kheapi nı taw khea chanan phwk cea cng km lng suyu d tx khea
læw mla xik ahˌ thangmwl kdi km lng suyu d
Nxk ca kxib lis man yexhying cxnghxng læa man xyu nı hmu phu ptiseth sraththa
phraxngkh tras wa xib li s xey xari lea thi khadkhwang cea mi hı cea suyu d tx sing thi kha di srang dwy mux thang sxng khxng kha cea yexhying cxnghxng nak hrux hrux wa cea xyu nı hmu phu sungsng
man klaw wa kha phraxngkh di kwa khea phraxngkh thrng srang kha phraxngkh cak fi læa thrng srang khea cak din
phraxngkh tras wa dangnan cea cng xxk pi cak thi ni pheraa thæcring cea pen phu thuk khab li
læa thæcring kar sap chæng khxng kha cng prasb kæ cea cnkrathang wan hæng kar txbthæn
man klaw wa xo phracea khxng kha phraxngkh di pord prawing wela hı kæ kha phraxngkh cnthung wan fun khunchiph dwy theid
phraxngkh tras wa dangnan thæcring cea xyu nı hmu phu thuk prawing wela
cnkrathang thung wan hæng wela thi thuk kahnd wi læw
man klaw wa dangnan dwy phra xanac khxng phraxngkh than nænxn kha phraxngkh k ca thahı phwk khea thanghmd hlng phid
wentæ pwng baw khxng phraxngkh nı hmu phwk khea thi mi cı brisuththi theanan
phraxngkh tras wa dangnan man pen khwam cring læa kha ca klaw tæ khwam cring theanan
nænxn kha ca hı nrk nan tem pi dwy phwk cea læa cak phu thi cheuxfang cea nı hmu phwk khea thanghmd
cng klaw theid muhammad wa chan midi khx rangwal kha txbthæn cak phwk than nı kar tha hnathi ni tæ xyang dı læa chan k midi xyu nı hmu phu hlxklwng xang siththi ley
man michı xun dı nxkcak penkar takteuxn kæ pwng mnusʹy
læa nænxn cea ca ru khawkhraw khx ngxalkurxan nı raya wela xan kıl ni
khamphir ni penkar prathan lng ma ca kxallxhˌ phuthrng xanac phuthrng pricha yan
thæcring rea di prathan khamphir mayang cea dwy sacthrrm dangnan cea cng khearph phakdi tx xallxhˌ doy pen phu mi khwam brisuththicı nı sasna tx phraxngkh

Phung thrab theid ka rxi ba dahˌ doy brisuththicı nan pen khx ngxallxhˌ xngkh deiyw swn brrda phu thi yudthux xea brrda phu khumkhrxng xun ca kxallxhˌ doy klaw wa rea midi khearph phakdi phwk khea wentæ pheux thahı rea khea kıl chid tx xallxhˌ thæ cring xallxhˌ ca thrng tadsin rahwang phwk khea nı sing thi phwk khea khadyæng kan nı reuxng nan thæ cring xallxhˌ ca mi thrng china thang kæ phu klaw thec phu mi sanuk buy khun

ha kxallxhˌ thrng prasngkh ca mi phra xors nænxn phraxngkh ca thrng leuxk cak sing thi phraxngkh thrng srang ma tam thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh mha brisuththi hæng phraxngkh than phra xngkh khux xallxhˌ phuthrng xe ka phuthrng phichit

phraxngkh thrng srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin dwy khwam cring xan chad cæng phraxngkh thrng hı klangkhun khabkeiyw kheapi nı klangwan læa thrng hı klangwan khabkeiyw kheapi nı klangkhun læa thrng hı dwng xathity læa dwng canthr pen prayochn (kæ mnusʹy) thuk sing khocr pi tam wara thi di kahnd wi phung thrab theid phraxngkh pen phuthrng xanac phuthrng xphay xyang mak

phraxngkh thrng srang phwk cea cak chiwit hnung læw cak chiwit nan thrng thahı pen khxng khukhrxng khxng man læa thrng prathan psusatw pæd taw pen khu kæ phwk cea phraxngkh thrng srang phwk cea nı khrrph khxng marda phwk cea penkar bangkeid khrang læw khrang lea xyu nı khwam mud sam chan nan khux xallxhˌ phracea khxng phwk cea phra xanac pen siththi khxng phraxngkh mimi phracea xun dı thi theiyngthæ nxkcak phraxngkh læw thami phwk cea cung phin hna pi thang xun

Hak phwk cea ptiseth sraththa dangnan thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng phx pheiyng cak phwk cea læa ca mi thrng piti yindi tx kar nerkhun khxng pwng baw khxng phraxngkh læa hak phwk cea ktayyu phraxngkh k ca thrng piti yindi tx phwk cea læa mimi phu bæk phara khn dı thi ca bæk phara khxng phu xun di læw yang phracea khxng phwk cea khux kark lab khxng phwk cea læa phraxngkh k ca thrng bxk lea phwk cea nı sing thi phwk cea di kratha wi thæcring phraxngkh nan pen phuthrng rxbru sing thi xyu nı thrwngxk

læa meux thukkh phay dı «prasb kæ mnusʹy khea k ca wingwxn khx tx phracea khxng khea pen phu han hna khea su phraxngkh xyang nxbnxm khran meux phraxngkh thrng prathan khwam pordpran cak phraxngkh hı kæ khea khea k lum sing thi khea di khey wingwxn khx tx phraxngkh ma tæ kxn læa khea di tang phakhi khukheiyng kab xallxhˌ pheux hı hlng cak thang khx ngxallxhˌ cng klaw theid(muhammad) than cng rareing pheiyng raya hnung tx kar ptiseth khxng than theid thæcring than nan xyu nı hmu chaw nrk

phu thi khea pen phu phakdi nı yam khakhun nı sphaph khxng phu suyu d læa phu yun lahmad doythi khea hwan kerng tx lok xa khi reaa hˌ læa hwang khwam metta khxng phracea khxng khea (ca hemuxnkab phu thi tang pha khi tx xallxhˌ kranan hrux?) Cng klaw theid(muhammad) brrda phu ru læa brrda phu miru ca theatheiym kan hrux? Thæcring brrda phu mi stipayya theanan thi ca khırkhrwy

cng klaw theid(muhammad) xo pwng baw phu sraththa thanghlay xey! Cng yakerng phracea khxng phwk than theid sahrab brrda phu thakhwam di nı lok ni khux (ca di rab kar txbthæn) khwam di læa phændin khx ngxallxhˌ nan kwanghıy phisal thæcring brrda phu xdthn nan ca di rab kar txbthæn rangwal khxng phwk khea xyang smburn doy mi txng khanwn
cng klaw theid(muhammad) thæcring chan di thuk baycha hı khearph phakdi tx xallxhˌ doy pen phu mi khwam brisuththicı nı sasna tx phraxngkh
Læa chan di thuk baycha hı chan pen khn ræk khxng pwng chn phu nxbnxm
cng klaw theid(muhammad) thæcring chan klaw kar lngthosʹ hæng wan xan ying hıy hak chan fafun phracea khxng chan
cng klaw theid che phaaxallxhˌ theanan thi chan khearph phakdi doy pen phu mi khwam brisuththicı nı sasna khxng chan tx phraxngkh

dangnan phwk than cng sakkara bucha tam thi phwk than prasngkh xun cak phraxngkh theid cng klaw theid wa thæcring brrda phu khadthun nan khux brrda phu thi thataw khxng phwk khea xeng læa khrxbkhraw khxng phwk khea hı khadthun nı wan ki ya mahˌ phung ru theid wa nan khux kar khadthun xyang chad cæng

sahrab phwk khea nan mi chan khxng pelw fi nrk pkkhlum henux phwk khea læa beuxng lang khxng phwk khea k mi chan khxng pelw fi nrk xyu dwy sing nan hæ la thi xallxhˌ thrng thahı pwng baw khxng phraxngkh klaw xo pwng baw khxng kha xey! Cng yakerng tx kha theid
læa brrda phu thi hlik hni hı hang cak phwk cewd pheux thi ca mi sakkara bucha man læa han pi cngrakphakdi tx xallxhˌ sahrab phwk khea nan mi khawdi dangnan cea cng cæng khawdi kæ pwng baw khxng kha

brrda phu thi sdab fang kha klaw læw ptibati tam thi di thisud khxng man chn hela ni khux brrda phu thi xallxhˌ thrng chinæa næwthang thi thuk txng kæ phwk khea læa chn hela ni phwk khea khux phu thi mi stipayya khırkhrwy
dangnan phu thi khaman sayya hæng kar lngthosʹ di khukhwr kæ khea læw (cea samarth ca hi da yahˌ hı kæ khea) kranan hrux? Læa cea ca chwy phu thi xyu nı nrk hı rxdphn di hrux

tæ brrda phu yakerng phracea khxng phwk khea nan sahrab phwk khea ca mi khvhasn snga xothong henux khun pi xik k mi khvhasn snga xothong srang wi n beuxng lang khxng man mi lana hlay say hil phan (man pen) khx sayya khx ngxallxhˌ xallxhˌ nan ca mi thrng bid phriw sayya

Cea mi hen dxk hrux wa thæ cring xallxhˌ thrng hlang nalng ma cak fak fa læw thrng hı man hil sum lng pi nı phændin pen tana dwy na nan thrng hı phuch ngxk xxk ma hlay si læw man k ca heiywhæng dangnan cea ca hen man klay pen si heluxng læw phraxngkh thrng thahı man pen sesʹ pen chin thæcring nı kar nan yxm pen khx teuxnsti kæ phu mi stipayya thanghlay

phu dı thi xallxhˌ thrng peid thrwngxk khxng khea pheux xislam læa khea xyu bn sængswang cak phracea khxng khea (ca hemuxnkab phu thi hawcı bxd kranan hrux?) Dangnan khwam wibati cng prasb dæ phu thi hawcı khxng phwk khea khæng kradang tx kar ra luk thung xallxhˌ chn hela ni xyu nı kar hlng phid xan chad cæng

xallxhˌ di thrng prathan kha klaw thi di ying lng ma pen khamphir khlxngcxng kan klaw sa kan phiwhnang khxng brrda phu thi kerng klaw phracea khxng phwk khea ca luk chan khun læw phiwhnang khxng phwk khea læa hawcı khxng phwk khea ca sngb lng pheux ra luk thung xallxhˌ nan khux kar china thang khx ngxallxhˌ phraxngkh ca thrng china thang kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa phu dı thi xallxhˌ thrng hı khea hlng thang dangnan sahrab khea ca mimi phu china thang

dangnan phu dı thi pxngkan bıhna khxng khea hı phn cak kar lngthosʹ xan chawcha nı wan ki ya mahˌ (ca hemuxnkab phu thi plxdphay cak kar lngthosʹ kranan hrux?) Læa ca miseiyng klaw kæ brrda phu xthrrm wa cng lim rs sing thi phwk cea sæwngha wi theid
brrda hmu chn kxn hna phwk khea di ptiseth ma læw dangnan kar lngthosʹ di mi mayang phwk khea doythi phwk khea miru suk taw
dangnan xallxhˌ thrng hı phwk khea lim rs khwam xapys nı chiwit khxng lok ni læa nænxn kar lngthosʹ nı prlok nan ying hıy kwa hak phwk khea di ru
læa doy nænxn rea di ykwi nı thuk «xu tha hrn nı xalkurxan ni sahrab mnusʹy pheux phwk khea ca di khırkhrwy
ku rxan pen phasʹa xahrab mimi kar khdkheiyw pheux phwk khea ca di yakerng

Xallxhˌ thrng yk xuthahrn chay khn hnung pen khxng hunswn hlay khn phwk khea khadyæng mi lngrxykan læa chay xik khn hnung pen khxng chay khn hnung doy chephaa thang sxng ni ca pen xuthahrn thi theatheiym kan hrux? Kar srrseriy thangmwl pen khx ngxallxhˌ tæwa swn mak khxng phwk khea miru
thæcring cea ca txng tay læa thæcring phwk khea ca txng tay
læw thæcring phwk cea nı wan ki ya mahˌ ca thktheiyng kan txhna phracea khxng phwk cea
